policy_source: UTAH MEDICAID PROGRAM â€” PRIOR AUTHORIZATION CLINICAL CRITERIA, Section 2: COVERAGE CRITERIA

checklist_sections.title: Eligible Diagnosis
checklist_sections.description: Member must have a documented diagnosis from one of the following categories
checklist_sections.help_text: Check the diagnosis code(s) that apply to the member's condition

items.label: Osteochondral Lesion
items.help_text: ICD-10: M93.2xx

checklist_sections.title: Clinical Findings
checklist_sections.description: At least one of the following clinical findings must be documented on physical examination within 30 days prior to the PA request
checklist_sections.help_text: Check the clinical findings that apply to the member's condition

items.label: Positive McMurray's Test
items.help_text: Documented positive McMurray's test

items.label: Joint Line Tenderness
items.help_text: Documented joint line tenderness with mechanical symptoms

items.label: Persistent Joint Effusion
items.help_text: Documented persistent joint effusion present for more than 4 weeks

items.label: Positive Lachman Test
items.help_text: Documented positive Lachman test

items.label: Instability on Varus/Valgus Stress
items.help_text: Documented instability on varus or valgus stress testing

items.label: Restricted Range of Motion
items.help_text: Documented restricted range of motion with a mechanical block

checklist_sections.title: Prior Imaging
checklist_sections.description: Weight-bearing radiographs (X-rays) of the affected knee must be completed within 60 calendar days prior to the date of the MRI prior authorization request
checklist_sections.help_text: Ensure that the X-ray report is available in the medical record

items.label: X-ray Report
items.help_text: X-ray report dated within 60 days of PA request

items.label: Weight-Bearing AP View
items.help_text: Weight-bearing AP view is required except when contraindicated

items.label: Radiograph Report Available
items.help_text: Radiograph report must be available in the medical record

checklist_sections.title: Conservative Treatment
checklist_sections.description: Member must have completed a minimum of six weeks of conservative therapy
checklist_sections.help_text: Ensure that the conservative treatment records are complete

items.label: Physical Therapy
items.help_text: Minimum of 6 documented sessions with a licensed physical therapist

items.label: Medication Trial
items.help_text: Documented trial of at least 4 weeks duration

items.label: Activity Modification
items.help_text: Documented activity modification and home exercise program

items.label: Bracing/Orthotics
items.help_text: Bracing, orthotics, or assistive devices (cane, crutches)

items.label: Intra-Articular Injection
items.help_text: Intra-articular injection (corticosteroid or hyaluronic acid)

exception_pathways.title: Acute Traumatic Injury
exception_pathways.description: The 6-week conservative treatment requirement is waived for acute traumatic injuries
exception_pathways.help_text: Document the specific exception criterion met

items.label: Inability to Bear Weight
items.help_text: Documented inability to bear weight at the time of evaluation

items.label: Suspected Complete Ligament Rupture
items.help_text: Suspected complete rupture of a major ligament (ACL, PCL, MCL, LCL)

items.label: Clinical Findings of Displaced Meniscal Tear
items.help_text: Clinical findings consistent with displaced meniscal tear (locked knee)

exception_pathways.title: Post-Operative
exception_pathways.description: The 6-week conservative treatment requirement is waived for post-operative evaluations
exception_pathways.help_text: Document the specific exception criterion met

items.label: Post-Operative Evaluation
items.help_text: Post-operative evaluation required within 6 months of knee surgery

exception_pathways.title: Red Flag
exception_pathways.description: The 6-week conservative treatment requirement is waived for red flag symptoms
exception_pathways.help_text: Document the specific exception criterion met

items.label: Suspected Joint Infection
items.help_text: Suspected joint infection (septic arthritis)

items.label: Suspected Primary/Metastatic Tumor
items.help_text: Suspected primary or metastatic tumor of bone or soft tissue

items.label: Suspected Occult Fracture
items.help_text: Suspected occult fracture not visualized on X-ray

exclusions.title: No Clinical Indication
exclusions.description: MRI knee without contrast is not covered when there is no clinical indication or symptoms

exclusions.title: Isolated Anterior Knee Pain
exclusions.description: MRI knee without contrast is not covered for isolated anterior knee pain without mechanical symptoms or instability

exclusions.title: Mild Osteoarthritis
exclusions.description: MRI knee without contrast is not covered for mild osteoarthritis when no surgical planning is intended

exclusions.title: Worker's Compensation
exclusions.description: MRI knee without contrast is not covered for worker's compensation injuries

exclusions.title: Member Declines Surgical Intervention
exclusions.description: MRI knee without contrast is not covered when the member declines surgical intervention regardless of MRI findings

exclusions.title: Repeat MRI
exclusions.description: MRI knee without contrast is not covered when there is no documented change in clinical status, failed intervention since prior imaging, or pre-operative planning requirement

denial_prevention_tips: Ensure that the prior authorization request includes all required documentation, including clinical notes, conservative treatment records, and X-ray reports
Verify that the member meets the eligible diagnosis and clinical findings requirements
Confirm that the conservative treatment requirement is met or that an exception applies
submission_reminders: Submit the prior authorization request via the Utah Medicaid PA Portal or by fax to 1-801-555-0100
Ensure that the authorization is valid for 60 calendar days from the approval date
Include all required documentation, including the X-ray report and conservative treatment records
